DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to identify genetic variations in survivors of testicular cancer and connect these variations to differences in risks of late effects.
DOC.brief_title: Toxicity Attributed to Genetic Polymorphisms in Testicular Germ Cell Tumor Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: Identification of late-effects through questionnaires and linkage to national registries. DNA samples will be gathered through buccal swabs or saliva kits and analysed with whole exome-sequencing.
DOC.criteria: Danish citizen Diagnosed with germ cell cancer from 1984 to 2007 Treated initially at a Danish hospital Treated with standard treatment regimens. Treated initially at a foreign hospital
